dict.acceptation: 居所；避难所；（无家可归者或受虐待者的）收容所；遮蔽；

sent.orig: The farmers decided to build shelter belt, and shelter slope.
sent.trans: 农民们打算营造护坡林，护田林。

sent.orig: SHELTER The cave provided a good shelter for ancient people.
sent.trans: 洞穴为古人提供了一个良好的避难所。

sent.orig: Provide secure shelter shelter for poultry, rabbits and other animals that could be attacked.
sent.trans: 为家禽、兔子和其它可能遭到袭击的动物提供安全的庇护。

sent.orig: This drive is important for getting food, shelter shelter and mates.
sent.trans: 这个动力对得到食物，栖息地和同伴是很重要的。

sent.orig: Nonetheless, I have volunteered to provide financial-literacy training to young mothers at a local homeless shelter.
sent.trans: 虽然如此，我自愿给当地流浪者庇护所的年轻的母亲们提供财政扫盲培训。
